system.description:
A construct is an animated object or artificially constructed creature.

Features: 10-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to Â¾ total Hit Dice (as cleric); no good saving throws. Most constructs are mindless and gain no skill points or feats.

Traits: Constructs do not eat, sleep, or breathe; no Constitution score; bonus hit points by size; not subject to critical hits, nonlethal damage, ability damage/drain, fatigue, exhaustion, or energy drain; immunity to poison, sleep, paralysis, stunning, disease, death effects, and mind-affecting effects; cannot heal on their own but often can be repaired; darkvision 60 ft. and low-light vision.
